showScoreExcerpt:
Chastain’s performance is superbly constructed, the cracks in its veneer sometimes visible but, until there’s no recourse, never threatening to bring the structure down. When Nora finally succumbs, she does so with deep power mingled with restraint...Ms. Chastain...has met the role’s challenges and left her indelible mark on it. 

Read more
